ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] dueling a druid
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the info - my new guild (been in about four weeks) does a goodly amount of dueling (although not much lately) - and I never had before.  I did
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the info - my new guild (been in about four weeks) does a goodly
amount of dueling (although not much lately) - and I never had before. I
did pretty lousy the two times I tried so far.

BTW - why do you /stopsong twice?

Thanks

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 10, 2001 2:43 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] dueling a druid



I recommend setting up a social key:

/stopsong
/stopsong
/target <yourname>
/cast <song number>
/target <opponent┬Æs name>
The nice thing about this social is your opponent is very quickly retargeted
so you can immediately resume punching/dismembering them.
